title: Kinetic Theory - Pressure on sides of container

content.prompt: A closed cylindrical container is filled with a monatomic ideal gas at room temperature. The area of the circular top surface of the container is A and the area of the cylindrical side of the container is 2A, as indicated in the figure. Which of the following statements about the pressure exerted by the gas on the top and side of the container is correct?

choices.label: The gas exerts zero pressure on the top and side.
The gas exerts the same nonzero pressure on the top and the side.
The gas exerts a greater pressure on the top than on the side.
The gas exerts a greater pressure on the side than on the top.

topic.text: 9.1: Kinetic Theory of Temperature and Pressure

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
